author: Staff Reporter
text:
Collector and District Election Officer Sajjansingh R. Chavan inspected the counting centre and strong room for keeping Electronic Voting Machines (EVMs) at the Government Engineering College at Konam in Nagercoil on Friday.

After inspecting the centre, Mr. Chavan expressed satisfaction over the arrangements made by the officials.

Later Mr. Sajjansingh R. Chavan also took a look at the video screened at the Vadaseri and Anna Bus stands in Nagercoil to create voter awareness through the Systematic Voters’ Education and Electoral Participation (SVEEP) programme, chalked out by the Election Commission of India.

The video on SVEEP featuring leading cine stars would be screened across the district at important junctions and places of public congregation.

Videos

It was also planned to screen the videos in areas where the polling percentage was low during the last election, an official said.

Mr. Chavan was accompanied by the Returning Officers Shreya P.Singh and S. Madhiyagan and Special Tahsildhar (Elections) Subramanian.
title: Counting centre, strong room inspected
